import React, {Fragment} from 'react' import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import{ connect } from "react-redux"; import { useState } from 'react' import { addEducation } from "../../actions/profile"; function Education({addEducation, history}) { const [formdata, setformdata] = useState({ school: "", degree: "", fieldofstudy: "", from: "", to: "", current: "", description: "" }); const { school, degree, fieldofstudy, from, to, current, description } = formdata; const onChange =(e)=>{ setformdata({...formdata, [e.target.name]:e.target.value})}; const onSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addEducation(formdata, history) } return (

Add Your Education

Add any school, bootcamp, etc that you have attended

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
onChange(e)} required />
onChange(e)} required />
onChange(e)} />

From Date

onChange(e)} />

onChange(e)}/> Current School or Bootcamp

To Date

onChange(e)}/>
Go Back
) } Education.propTypes = { addEducation: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, { addEducation })(withRouter(Education));
